featured.text: The robot described itself as an extension of a person to help humans increase the workload.
He can still vividly describe his first day at school as a child.
The snow-capped mountain is described so _____ in the book that the scene seems to come alive in front of the reader’s eyes.
Dr. Hare, one of the venture’s co-founders, says a dog’s intelligence can’t be described with a single number.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

other.text: Which of the following best describes the author’s attitude toward medical tests?
The passage is written mainly to describe __________.
Which of the following best describes the author’s attitude toward the future of desalination? (A) Amazed.
Why does the author use “the blackened heart” in paragraph 2 to describe Moran’s hometown?
In fact, my life can be described as consisting of a series of “ups” and “downs.” 41.
Most of his photos described things that happen every day.
Which of the following describes the order of changes in the features of a blackspot angelfish during gender change? (A) Size  behavior  color  stripes.
Which of the following best describes Cartier-Bresson’s family background?
Which of the following best describes the life the author is leading?
What is the purpose of the study described in this passage? (A)
It describes a woman who is called by her long-dead mother to go “beyond the ridge.”
Which of the following titles best describes the main idea of this passage? (A) The Origin of Lullabies (B) The Functions of Lullabies (C) Threatening Lullabies (D) Sleep-Inducing Lullabies 54.
Captivated by the utterly fantastic sights Langford described, Moran became eager to see this odd territory for himself.

definition.zh_def: 描述；描繪某事物的特徵或性質。
definition.en_def: To give an account of something by providing details about its characteristics or qualities.
definition.example: She used vivid language to describe the beautiful sunset.
